DOC.HEADLINE: MAN SENTENCED TO 12 YEARS IN 1991 SLAYING OF GIRLFRIEND
DOC.TEXT: David Joseph Goodman , formerly of Canoga Park , was sentenced Tuesday to 12 years in prison for the June , 1991 , stabbing death of his girlfriend . Goodman pleaded no contest last month to the charges.By entering the plea , he avoided a trial at which his mother and brother were expected to testify against him . The body of Beth Hollander was found the morning of June 20 , 1991 , behind a dumpster in the 21500 block of Prairie Street . She had been beaten , strangled and stabbed . Her death remained a mystery until 16 months later , when Goodman ' s mother called police to say her son admitted the killing to her , and that she had tried to persuade him to surrender to police . According to court documents , Goodman told his mother and brother that he had stabbed Hollander in self-defense during a quarrel . Goodman , a Jaguar mechanic who was born in Liverpool , England , and has lived_in the United States since 1981 , had violently abused Hollander during a stormy , eight-year relationship , authorities said . Before her death , Goodman had attempted to reconcile with Hollander and gave her an engagement_ring . But Hollander told friends the night before she died that she planned to give the ring back , according to court records .
